Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to prohibiting wind turbines from being located in a certain area of the city of New York
Summary: Prohibits wind turbines from being located within 1500 feet of a residential area or commercial shopping district within the city of New York.
LawCode: Add Title 27 Chap 1 Subchap 7 Art 23 ยง27-521.17, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting wind turbines from being located within 1500 feet of residential areas and/or commercial shopping districts
